Description: Narrow bag or detachable pocket of blue cotton. Made of one piece of cloth folded in half and seamed across the bottom and up the side. Open end hemmed. Remains of a loop of white cotton at one corner.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), Room 91A Unit 26 wall fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
